name: Neko Navy
description: Flying cats versus 10,000 soothing characters! What awaits them beyond all those furious midair fights...? Witness the world's most shocking ending for yourself!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 2.0GHz or higher Graphics: DirectX 9 or above compatible card with 512MB VRAM or more DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
